channel.title: A short Story
channel.description:
Well I really wanted to write a story based on Runescape so here it is Enjoy :P
On one fine day About a year ago Marc took his small Friend To visit Falodor park: [img]http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/8059/welcomeuz9.jpg[/img] Whats this Ollie is walking away?
Marc went for a small walk to find Ollie: [img]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/8695/waydrb5.jpg[/img]
Ollie was being a bad boy so Marc took Ollie away for a year. Marc took Ollie back but Ollie started to walk away: [img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/1969/walkawaylg1.png[/img]
And then tried to hide in some plants: [img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/2839/comebackfw2.png[/img]
Then Played in the mud: [img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/6827/muduy6.png[/img]
Marc let Ollie play for a bit. [img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/719/behindjl3.png[/img]
After Marcs little boo-boo he found Ollie on some of Farmers Bob's flowers: [img]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/7822/farmerboboh7.png[/img]
Then They both went home. [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/189/goinghomecx2.png[/img]
THE END
There will be more to come people
NOTE: Ooo Java would you like to star in the next Ep?
